snippet: In an expansion of a pilot program, the hotel chain offers New Balance shoes and clothing to accommodate airline travelers who want to pack light.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column on expansion of Westin Hotels pilot program, which offers New Balance shoes and clothing to accommodate airline travelers who want to pack light but plan on using exercise facilities at their hotels.
lead_paragraph: In an expansion of a pilot program, the hotel chain offers New Balance shoes and clothing to accommodate airline travelers who want to pack light.

headline.seo: Westin Lends New Balance Gear at Its Hotels
headline.main: Westin Hotels Lend Gear So Travelers Can Exercise
headline.print_headline: Westin Hotels Lend Gear So Travelers Can Exercise
